long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Catch Cat Game! This addictive little game is inspired by the classic game of trapping the elusive "neko" (cat). In this game, you'll face clever and cunning cats and use your strategy and reflexes to trap them in a small area. Are you ready for the challenge?

Key Features:

Easy to Pick Up: The game has simple and straightforward rules, suitable for players of all ages. By tapping on the squares on the screen, you can trap the cats in a confined area. But be careful, the cats will struggle and try to escape, so you need to react quickly to prevent them from getting away.

Varied Levels: The game features multiple levels, each with different maps and cat layouts. From easy to challenging, each level will test your strategic thinking and reflexes. Challenge yourself, unlock higher levels, and become a master at trapping cats!

Extension Button Menu
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
